about_me.name: Vitor Stähelin
about_me.title: Full-Stack Engineer
about_me.summary: Results-driven Full-Stack Developer with over 6 years of experience specializing in Python. Expertise in creating scalable, secure, and efficient solutions using Python, JavaScript, Django, React, Gatsby, and React Native. Proven track record in developing OTA platforms from scratch, integrating APIs, and implementing payment gateways. Experienced in blockchain Proof of Concepts (POCs) with Stellar network and in developing IoT and embedded systems.
about_me.short_summary: Full-Stack Developer with 6+ years of experience in Python, JavaScript, and frameworks like Django and React. Skilled in building scalable solutions, API integrations, and payment systems. Background in blockchain POCs and IoT/embedded systems.

education.institution: Unisul - Universidade do Sul de Santa Catarina

professional_experience.title: Senior Full-Stack Software Developer
responsibilities: Develop and maintain the new OTA platform using Django with Python and Django REST Framework (DRF).
Integrate APIs from hotel providers like Omnibees, payment APIs like PagBank, and the consolidating airline booking API Envision.

Assist in creating and developing the new R&D area, applying agile methodologies (Scrum and Kanban), managing and prioritizing tasks for other developers, establishing development standards, applying clean code principles, and designing software architecture.
Ensure the platform's security and scalability through effective use of Django and DRF.

professional_experience.title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
responsibilities: Developed cryptocurrency projects using Django REST Framework in Python, including a Proof of Concept (POC) for a BRL stablecoin for the largest bank in Latin America, in collaboration with Mercado Bitcoin and Bacen.
Worked on a Central Bank Digital Currency (CBDC) for Bank Indonesia in partnership with ANZ (Australia and New Zealand Banking Group). Both projects utilized the Stellar network.

Contributed to front-end development projects such as ReawardsApp, a lottery app built with React Native, and a corporate website developed using Gatsby.js, focusing on intuitive and responsive user interfaces.

Implemented agile development practices, utilizing methodologies like Scrum and Kanban, and adopted CI/CD, clean code principles, and thorough documentation to ensure code quality and maintainability.

professional_experience.title: Full-Stack Software Developer
responsibilities: Prototyped and developed IoT systems and embedded solutions, creating both hardware and software for remote monitoring and control of equipment.

Developed and maintained the ScadaBR supervisory system using Java Spring Boot (version 6), managed TCP/IP connections and HTTP protocols for webhooks, and applied it in industrial control and automation processes.
Implemented monitoring and telemetry systems using tools such as Grafana, Prometheus, and InfluxDB.
Adopted agile practices and CI/CD concepts, utilized Scrum and Kanban to ensure continuous delivery and ongoing improvement of the developed systems.

projects.name: whiteStone_dev
projects.description: Co-founded whiteStone_dev, a group of developers in Pedra Branca - Palhoça, that meets periodically to discuss technology trends. Each season of our meetings focuses on different topics aimed at sharing knowledge, networking, and exchanging experiences. The sessions are recorded and posted on our blog, providing access to those who couldn't attend.

projects.name: GomuGomu SaaS
projects.description: Developing GomuGomu, a SaaS platform designed as a comprehensive wallet for One Piece TCG players. The platform allows users to manage their card collections, track values, and operate as a marketplace.

projects.name: OLOP Price Scraping
projects.description: Web scraper for OLOP site, merging common scraping tactics with Selenium and Beautiful Soup with computer vision to collect card values, all served through a Flask API.

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: My personal portfolio project built with React and TypeScript.

projects.name: CMS Portfolio
projects.description: Repository that serves as a CMS, which also includes an automated system to generate and update a file map (`site_map.json`) of static resources, including images and structured data, hosted on GitHub Pages.

projects.name: LOL Live Team Companion
projects.description: Little project to monitor League of Legends client and server live data to send everything to a shared dashboard.

projects.name: Bizarre Correlations
projects.description: This is a project to explore the concept of bizarre correlations. The idea is to find correlations between two variables that are not related at all. The project is based on the Spurious Correlations website. Basic is a scraper that gets data from the Spurious Correlations website and saves i an key-value store.

projects.name: Tcg Card Recognition
projects.description: This project is a proof of concept to recognize TCG cards using Dhash and OpenCV2.

projects.name: POC - BRL Stablecoin
projects.description: Worked to The Brazilian Central Bank LIFT challenge in a partnership with Mercado Bitcoin to present a pilot application for a DvP(Delivery versus Payment) use case that combined a precatory investment token and a wrapped version of the digital Real, and all on Stellar's network

projects.name: POC - CBDC Indonesia
projects.description: Worked to the Indonesia’s Central Bank challenge in a partnership with eCurrency and ANZ bank to simulate a CBDC in a public network
